title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.2 - Premises to be used for conduct of games of chance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4602.2 - Premises to be used for conduct of games of chance

State Regulations

In case the applicant intends to lease premises for the
conduct of games of chance from an authorized games of chance lessor, the
application shall set forth the name and address of the authorized lessor of
such premises and the amount of rent to be paid or other consideration to be
given directly or indirectly for each license period for use of the
premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4602.2

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
